report.name: monprofil

dataSource.name: Q_CP
dataSource.select: select distinct situ.cpident "cp_cpident", r_cp.rnom "cp_nom", r_cp.rprenom "cp_prenom", r.ident "cp_rident", r.rnom "cp_rnom", r.rprenom "cp_rprenom", '' "cp_pid", '' "cp_pid_lib" from situ_ress_full situ, ressource r, ressource r_cp, datdebex d where INSTR(:P_CHEF_PROJET, to_char(situ.cpident,'FM00000')) > 0 and situ.type_situ = 'N' and (situ.datsitu IS NULL or situ.datsitu <= d.moismens) and (situ.datdep IS NULL or situ.datdep >= d.datdebex) and situ.ident = r.ident and situ.cpident = r_cp.ident UNION select distinct bip.pcpi, r_cp.rnom, r_cp.rprenom, 0, '', '', bip.pid, bip.pnom from ligne_bip bip, ressource r_cp where INSTR(:P_CHEF_PROJET, to_char(bip.pcpi,'FM00000')) > 0 and bip.adatestatut is null and bip.pcpi = r_cp.ident

dataSource.name: Q_PERIME
dataSource.select: -- Primetre Fournisseur SELECT vue_dpg.codsg "perime_dpg", s_info.libdsg "perime_dpg_lib" FROM vue_dpg_perime vue_dpg, struct_info s_info WHERE INSTR(:P_PERIME, to_char(vue_dpg.codbddpg,'FM00000000000')) > 0 and vue_dpg.codsg = s_info.codsg (+) and s_info.topfer='O'

dataSource.name: Q_PERIMO
dataSource.select:
-- perimetre MO SELECT mo.clicode "perimo_clicode", mo.clisigle "perimo_sigle", mo.clilib "perimo_lib" FROM vue_clicode_perimo vue_clicode, client_mo mo
WHERE INSTR(:P_PERIMMO, to_char(vue_clicode.bdclicode,'FM000000000')) > 0 and vue_clicode.clicode = mo.clicode and mo.clitopf='O'

dataSource.name: Q_RESSOURCES
dataSource.select: select r.ident "r_ident", r.rnom "r_nom", r.rprenom "r_prenom" from ressource r where r.ident in( select distinct ress.ident from ressource ress where INSTR(:P_CHEF_PROJET, to_char(ress.ident,'FM00000')) > 0 MINUS select distinct situ.cpident from datdebex d, situ_ress_full situ where situ.type_situ = 'N' and (situ.datsitu IS NULL or situ.datsitu <= d.moismens) and (situ.datdep IS NULL or situ.datdep >= d.moismens) MINUS select distinct bip.pcpi from ligne_bip bip where bip.adatestatut is null)

dataSource.name: Q_DOS_PROJ
dataSource.select: -- Dossiers Projets select dpcode "dos_proj", dplib "dos_proj_lib" from dossier_projet &P_DP

dataSource.name: Q_PROJETS
dataSource.select: -- Projets select icpi "proj", ilibel "proj_lib" from proj_info where INSTR(:P_PROJET, icpi) > 0

dataSource.name: Q_APP
dataSource.select: -- Projets select airt "app", alibel "app_lib" from application where INSTR(:P_APP, airt) > 0

dataSource.name: Q_CA_FI
dataSource.select: select es.codcamo "ca_fi", nvl(ca.clibca,es.licoes) "ca_fi_lib", es.niveau "ca_fi_niv", nvl(to_char(ca.cdateferm),'ACTIF') "ca_fi_date_cess" from centre_activite ca, entite_structure es where INSTR(:P_CA_FI, to_char(es.codcamo,'FM00000')) > 0 and es.codcamo = ca.codcamo (+)

dataSource.name: Q_CA_PAYEUR
dataSource.select: select es.codcamo "ca_payeur", nvl(ca.clibca,es.licoes) "ca_payeur_lib", es.niveau "ca_payeur_niv", nvl(to_char(ca.cdateferm),'ACTIF') "ca_payeur_date_cess" from centre_activite ca, entite_structure es where INSTR(:P_CA_PAYEUR, to_char(es.codcamo,'FM00000')) > 0 and es.codcamo = ca.codcamo (+)

dataSource.name: Q_CA_SUIVINV
dataSource.select: -- CA suivi investissement select es.codcamo "ca_suivinv", nvl(ca.clibca,es.licoes) "ca_suivinv_lib", es.niveau "ca_suivinv_niv", nvl(to_char(ca.cdateferm),'ACTIF') "ca_suivinv_date_cess" from centre_activite ca, entite_structure es where INSTR(:P_CA_SUIVINV, to_char(es.codcamo,'FM00000')) > 0 and es.codcamo = ca.codcamo (+)

dataSource.name: Q_MENUS
dataSource.select: select lib as menus_lib from ( select ' ' as lib from dual &P_MENUS ) where length(trim(lib)) > 0

dataSource.name: Q_SSMENUS
dataSource.select: select lib as ssmenus_lib from ( select ' ' as lib from dual &P_SSMENUS ) where length(trim(lib)) > 0

dataSource.name: Q_CENTRE_FRAIS
dataSource.select: select codcfrais, libcfrais from centre_frais &P_WHERE order by codcfrais;

dataSource.name: Q_CA_DA
dataSource.select: select es.codcamo "ca_da", nvl(ca.clibca,es.licoes) "ca_da_lib", es.niveau "ca_da_niv", nvl(to_char(ca.cdateferm),'ACTIF') "ca_da_date_cess" from centre_activite ca, entite_structure es where INSTR(:P_CA_DA, to_char(es.codcamo,'FM00000')) > 0 and es.codcamo = ca.codcamo (+)

dataSource.name: Q_PERIMCLI
dataSource.select:
-- perimetre MCLI SELECT mo.clicode "perimcli_clicode", mo.clisigle "perimcli_sigle", mo.clilib "perimcli_lib" FROM vue_clicode_perimo vue_clicode, client_mo mo
WHERE INSTR(:P_PERIMCLI, to_char(vue_clicode.bdclicode,'FM000000000')) > 0 and vue_clicode.clicode = mo.clicode and mo.clitopf='O'
